sentences.en: " Don't you go throwing the Confederacy in my face!
sentences.cn: " 你犯不着用南部联盟来压我嘛!

sentences.en: Blood : a tribe of the Blackfoot confederacy inhabiting southern alberta.
sentences.cn: 布拉德族: 在南艾伯塔居住的黑脚族的一支部落.

sentences.en: In many ways, the place resembled the busy young city of the Confederacy's early days.
sentences.cn: 在很多方面, 这个地方很像南部联盟初期那个热闹的年轻都会.

sentences.en: Jefferson Davis , the president of the Confederacy , had been captured!
sentences.cn: 南方联盟的总统杰佛逊? 大卫斯 被抓了!

sentences.en: Ladies, the Confederacy asks for your jewelry on behalf of our noble cause.
sentences.cn: 过场:女士, 为了高尚得事业,南方联盟需要你的珠宝来获取资金.

sentences.en: Lok Durd was an obese Neimoidian general in the army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
sentences.cn: 洛克·杜德是独立星系邦联中一位臃肿的内莫第亚人将军.

sentences.en: RHETT: We've sort of shocked the Confederacy, Scarlett.
sentences.cn: 瑞德: 我们震惊了整个南方联盟, 思佳丽.

sentences.en: South Carolina's secession imitated by ten other states and led to the formation of the confederacy.
sentences.cn: 南卡罗来纳州分离出去,其它十个州也分离出去,便导致了联邦的形成.
南部联盟的命运已经注定了.

sentences.en: The Confederacy was defeated by the northern states.
sentences.cn: 南部邦联被北方打败了.

sentences.en: The people of the Creek confederacy occupied some 50 towns.
sentences.cn: 克里克联邦的人占领了大约50个镇子.

sentences.en: The related tribes, at least in some cases, are united in a confederacy.
sentences.cn: 部落联盟至少是在个别情况下把亲属部落联合在一起.

sentences.en: The windows smiled, the door coaxed and beckoned, the creeper blushed confederacy.
sentences.cn: 窗户都微微含笑, 门户都甘言引诱,举手招呼,长春藤也都因为暗中同谋,满面现出赧颜.

sentences.en: They've entered this new confederacy because the central government's been unable to control the collapsing economy.
sentences.cn: 他们已经参加了这个新同盟，因为中央政府已经不能控制摇摇欲坠的经济了。

sentences.en: This bond of kin represented the real basis of the confederacy.
sentences.cn: 这种血缘亲属关系是联盟的真实基础。

words.tran_cn: 使联盟；使联合；同伙；帮凶
